comments.body: @trishnaguha Adding items to existing changelog fragments will cause the new changelog items to show up in whatever release the fragment was originally added in, which I'm guessing was *not* your intent. It's OK to do that between releases, but let's say this fragment was added in 2.5.1- your changes will now show up under 2.5.1 instead of 2.5.3 (which is incorrect).
@nitzmahone ah I wasn't aware of that. I will open a separate PR to fix that. Thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@- nxos_linkagg - nxos_linkagg abbreviated form issue (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/39591)
- nxos_snmp_user - Fix nxos_snmp_user (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/39760)
- nxos_logging - remove purge from nxos_logging doc, argspec (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/39947)
- nxos_ping - Fix nxos_ping issues (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/40028)
- nxos_vxlan_vtep_vni - Fix nxos_vxlan_vtep_vni test (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/39968)
